content.prompt: Which of the following will initially result from an increase in the market demand for a good?

choices.label: There will be a matching increase in supply.
There will be a decrease in quantity supplied.
There will be a temporary shortage at the original equilibrium price.
Total producer surplus in the market will decrease.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
